body_html:
This seems like an awesome feature to have, but at the same time will break everyone's existing code in various ways.

Considering that, we'll add this for the 0.2 major release.

Broadcasting itself can be added sooner as it doesn't need any thought on backward-compatibility.

We've added the first step to broadcasting by now having expand / expand_as automatically add leading dimensions as needed.

I like the opinion of @jph00 and largely agree with it, but we are putting a lot of thought into backward-compatibility and not breaking existing code.

body:
This seems like an awesome feature to have, but at the same time will break everyone's existing code in various ways.

Considering that, we'll add this for the 0.2 major release.

Broadcasting itself can be added sooner as it doesn't need any thought on backward-compatibility.

We've added the first step to broadcasting by now having expand / expand_as automatically add leading dimensions as needed.

I like the opinion of @jph00 and largely agree with it, but we are putting a lot of thought into backward-compatibility and not breaking existing code.
